description: Enterprise techniques used by Responder, ATT&CK software S0174 (v1.2)
name: Responder (S0174)

techniques.comment: [Responder](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0174) is used to poison name services to gather hashes and credentials from systems within a local network.(Citation: GitHub Responder)
[Responder](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0174) captures hashes and credentials that are sent to the system after the name services have been poisoned.(Citation: GitHub Responder)
